timeline.message:
Fixed two problems in CompareGtcFiles
1) Minor typo in list of excluded methods
2) Added back a bunch of getters in InfiniumGTCFile to allow for CompareGtcFiles to compare their values.

timeline.bodyText: Blame the code reviewers for missing that one
timeline.author: pshapiro4broad

replies.bodyText: Or should have cut and pasted.
replies.author: gbggrant

timeline.author: pshapiro4broad

replies.bodyText: That was just me manually collapsing them.  I couldn't distinguish it from the IDE's autocollapse.
replies.author: gbggrant
